main event: One object was sighted in Ventura, California on 24 May 1957, described as round and silver or white, after the noise of a jet breaking the sound barrier.
interesting points: The object was observed for 22 minutes,It was only the size of the head of a pin,The object oscillated before fading out of sight,No radar detection was available due to a blind spot in the area,The conclusion leaned towards the object being either a balloon or an aircraft.
sighted object: one round silver or white object
